TrainSMART – Corporate Training Company & Solutions Provider

Your teams need better training.

TrainSMART gives you custom training that actually works—built by experts, delivered with impact.



Why Choose TrainSmart? → Contact Us →

Custom-Tailored
Learning & Development Solutions

For over 30 years, TrainSMART has specialized in helping our clients identify people and process challenges that may be preventing their organizations from achieving optimal results. Our goals are to partner with you to assess, envision, develop, and execute powerful training that increases productivity, improves performance and inspires continuous focus on excellence through a wide range of learning solutions.

Employee development and improving processes are a competitive advantage and strategic necessity in today’s challenging economic times. Let TrainSMART assist your organization by helping maximize your most important resource: YOUR PEOPLE! We take a collaborative approach to creating a tailored training strategy for success. Learn more about our custom training solutions below:

Custom Training Solutions For Businesses

TrainSMART’s Instructional Design Services

Forget cookie-cutter training programs. At TrainSMART, we collaborate with you to craft truly transformative learning experiences tailored to your organization’s unique needs.

Our instructional design consultants are relentless in their pursuit of learner engagement and business impact. We uncover your strategic challenges, capabilities gaps, and performance opportunities.

Then we design immersive courses, scenario-based simulations, and gamified learning journeys – leveraging neuroscience, motivation science, and the latest technologies to drive retention and behavior change.

The result? We don’t just develop your people. We create agile learners and high-impact teams that drive your most ambitious goals. Ready to unlock your organization’s full potential? You’re ready for TrainSMART.

Instructional Design Services

Custom eLearning
Development

TrainSmart creates creative, interactive, and engaging custom eLearning solutions for clients in the life sciences, financial, education, energy, manufacturing, and utility industries.

Our eLearning development team is proficient in various eLearning course authoring tools, such as HTML5, Articulate Storyline, Articulate Presenter, and Adobe Captivate.

Learn more about how TrainSMART’s eLearning development team can help you today!

 

Custom eLearning Development

 

 

Our Talented Learning & Development Consultants From Around The Globe

Our most impressive asset: is a talented consultant base with skills in facilitating, training, coaching, instructional design, technology, multimedia development, organizational development, talent development, and project management. We assign the best talent to fit opportunities unique to your organization. It is important for us to learn about your company and immerse ourselves in the culture, vision, and company strategies. 

Whether it is a company-wide needs assessment, soft skills training, eLearning development, one-on-one executive coaching or anything in between, TrainSmart’s corporate training consultants have the knowledge and expertise to deliver training and development services anywhere in the world.

Hire Our Team Of Consultants

Instructional Design Consultants

Organizational Development Consultants

Leadership Development Consultants

Change Management Consultants

Presentation Skills Trainer

Corporate Trainers

 

 

 

Custom-Tailored
Soft Skills Training For Groups & Teams

TrainSMART offers custom-tailored in-person and virtual instructor-led soft skills training workshops to enhance employee abilities, communication, leadership, morale, satisfaction, and performance.

Leadership Training Workshops

Lead By Example

Increased confidence, communication, and engagement lead to higher-performing employees.

Leadership Training Workshops

Communication Training

The Lifeblood

Maximize productivity and improve morale with our entertaining, customized, on-site communication training.

Workplace Communication Training

Customer Service Training

Best First Impressions

Improve customer loyalty! Strengthen telephone, greeting, listening, and problem-solving skills.

Customer Service Training

Corporate Team Building

Work Better Together

Learn the importance of teamwork, and its impact on productivity and develop team communication with our customizable courses.

 

Team Building Training

 

Training For Trainers, Instructional Designers & SMEs

Training Expertise

Specialized for SMEs who need to train others and internal trainers who would like to improve their delivery.

Training For Trainers & Instructional Designers

Strategic Skills

The Tools You Need

A range of workshops designed to improve strategic thinking, manage change, and improve organizational culture and performance.

Strategic Skills Training

 

Custom-Tailored Soft Skills Training

Enroll In TrainSMART’s 3-Day Internationally Certified Train-the-Trainer Program

TrainSmart offers the only “instructor-led” train-the-trainer program certified by the International Board of Certified Trainers.

Throughout 2025, we will run public Train-the-Trainer workshops in the following cities: San Diego, CA, Minneapolis/St. Paul. Paul, MN, Austin, TX, Atlanta, GA, Nashville, TN, and Orlando, FL.

3-Day Train-the-Trainer Price: $2200
3-Day Train-the-Trainer with IBCT Certification $2600

Want a custom on-site train-the-trainer workshop? Call 800-807-8030.

If you are responsible for any training in your organization, TrainSmart’s Train-the-Trainer program is for you!

 

Register For A Public Train-the-Trainer Course

Convince My Boss

Success & Quality You Can Trust

"Trainsmart is one of our most valued providers. ...For a variety of subjects ...they always deliver top instructors. Content and materials are excellent."

Robert McGraw –
Thermos Fisher Scientific

"...The instructional designers were able to create a beautiful, relative, meaningful training program that impressed managers and provided staff the [desired] knowledge."

Kristen Ramos –
Training Specialist

"TrainSmart has become a valued training and development resource to us. They consistently deliver and exceed our expectations..."

Jennifer Werneke -
Vice President, Human Resources at Cotter Consulting, Inc

They customize every deliverable according to our specifications and they offer advice when needed. They make it easy to deploy the same training in different regions because they are very culturally aware and sensitive to the differences required by each region around the globe. We have yet to ask them for something that they are unable to deliver. Trainsmart does it all!

Carol Marzouk
Dean of Global Executive Leadership and Development at UL
